de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.factory
Class AbstractFactory

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.factory.AbstractFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
DriverFactory, ModelFactory
public class AbstractFactory
extends java.net.URLClassLoader

Factory class used to instantiate Classes. Implementations are defined in the factory properties file. Implementations can also be instantiated using the class name and the implementation's classpath.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Robert Turner
